title: Thank you and see you soon!
description: Your reservation for <date>{{date}}</date> at <time>{{time}}</time> has been successfully submitted. You should receive a confirmation email at the address <email>{{email}}</email>. Looking forward to seeing you soon!

alert.title: Are you sure you want to cancel your reservation?
alert.description: Once canceled, other customers can take your place. However, nothing prevents you from booking again!
